com.nestedbird.config

Class DatabaseConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestedbird.config.DatabaseConfig

  • public class DatabaseConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for configuring the database This includes reading properties from the properties files and creating required beans

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new Database config.

        Instantiates a new Database config.
        Parameters:
        dbDriver - the db driver
        dbPassword - the db password
        dbUrl - the db url
        dbUsername - the db username
        hibernateDialect - the hibernate dialect
        hibernateShowSql - the hibernate show sql
        hibernateHbm2DDLAuto - the hibernate hbm 2 ddl auto
        entitymanagerPackagesToScan - the entitymanager packages to scan
        hibernateUseSqlComments - the hibernate use sql comments
        hibernateFormatSql - the hibernate format sql
